website_summaries.verdict: Lacks the quality of our top pick and the value of less-costly models on our list.
cons: Blade is on the short side
some owners report going over tough patches several times
Won't cut all types of grass or weeds, especially those with sturdy stalks

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy!!!!! I was hesitant to use because I see people saying the manual mowers are hard to use. This is not the case! My 8 year old loved using it. We took turn with our hilly, large side yard and I felt like it didn’t rough up the yard like our big power mower does. So happy I switched to this.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Grey

customer_reviews.title: its not perfect, but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: THis little thing does a good job of getting your lawn mowed quietly. WHile it will never give you as good a cut as an engine powered lawn mower, it does the job. There is a bit of a learning curve to get used to the inset of the blade from the wheels, but once you get that down and learn to overlap your mowing. it goes fast and well. there will always be some blades that it missed, but it is fun and it is quiet to use. My 12 yr old daughter and I both enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable experience
customer_reviews.text: For small yard, manual cutter is ok, no need for gas or corded operation. A plastic piece was cracked out of the box, assume that was for a grass catcher which I don't plan to use. Also, very long pieces of grass will not get cut as they get bent down, width of cutting blades will pass over, before the grass will stick up again. Figures on how to adjust cutting height were not as helpful as could have been. I agree with other reviewers that the foam grips should be sized for insertion without needing soapy water (as it says in the manual).
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got mine same day free delivery!! Woo hoo! Watched a video online a guy posted about putting it together and followed his lead. Put it together in about 10 minutes with no tools👍 Did my first mow and it worked perfectly!! We have a new Zeon Zoysia lawn and my landscaper suggested a reel mower. I mowed this first time on the setting it came set to. It’s in the middle hole. I’ll go lower as I keep mowing down to 1”. Looks awesome!!! Super easy to use! I will have to use a weed eater on the edges by the fence I think but that is no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Works Extremely well and Is Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about ordering this because some reviews suggested that it gets stuck on sticks and such. I have had no problems. I live in New Orleans and I have a driveway with grass down the middle, admittedly not much grass, but this is spectacular on weeds, clover, you name it. I also have some gravel that has gotten mixed in over the years and still nothing stops this great mower. Totally worth the price which is half what some non-motorized mowers cost. If you don't have a ton of grass this is a fine solution. Also, it's kind of zen to mow the lawn with absolutely no noise save for some gentle clicking.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Workman

customer_reviews.title: Rusty hunk of junk only one month in
customer_reviews.text: It's crap. Should have gone with the electric push mower. Have had this for a month and used it four times...already the blades are rusting and it's increasingly harder to push. Cuts most grass, but much of it (as well as any long weed) simply gets rolled over and pops right back up. Return window has closed for me, so now I'm stuck with a rusty hunk of metal to dispose of. Don't waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I have received some shoddy merchandise from Amazon this last year, including busted things that were returned by someone else and then just shipped straight back out to me without taking the prior customers return slip out . This one however, takes the cake - when we opened the box, the mower and box were full of grass clippings, wheels covered in clippings and dirt....REALLY? You just send this back out like this? Someone probably just needed to mow once and then returned - who knows, but this quality control is obviously non-existent and now I have the hassle of having to box it back up, etc. and obviously look for another mower not from this vendor!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ecklund

customer_reviews.title: Blades are sharp and the product seems safe
customer_reviews.text: Pros: + So glad I went with this option than a powered lawnmower + Easily adjustable, and keeps the lawn looking very neat and trim in Southern California + Blades are sharp and the product seems safe Cons: - Still need to figure out how to trim the edges of lawns more consistently when next to a high concrete walkway, but that would have been the case with any lawnmower
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Exercise included. But so worth it
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say this is very easy to use at almost any age. It's true it does not like certain grass in my yard. But then again neither do I LOL. But it does work wonderfully depending on the height of your grass you may have to take two or three goes at it. But it does work wonderfully and helps you get your exercise so it's a win-win. And with this you don't have to plug it in you don't have to rip your arm out of socket to try to pull cord and it's just easy for a smaller yard.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Mohle

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I had never mowed before, and only have a parking strip to do now. I really didn't want to deal with a big mower or engines, etc. My sister suggested I look into manual push mowers. Honestly, I had no idea they were still made. I read some reviews and watched some videos and picked this one up. I will be using it for the fourth time this weekend. There is a learning curve, but I am getting the hang of it. So easy to get out and put away. And I am happy that I am not using fuel, oil, etc. I would recommend this if you have a small yard or small patch.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great mower but not for tall grass
customer_reviews.text: This mower does an amazing job at cutting grass but only if you consistently mow. In other words, if you let the grass get too tall, this particular mower will NOT work. This ultimately means you'll have to mow more frequently than if you had a motorized one. That said, if you like to be outside and get some nice excercise and want to help the environment by not using a motorized mower, this one is for you. I knocked one star off simply because it's awful at cutting TALL grass.
customer_reviews.author: litta015

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Tires look like Tread
customer_reviews.text: kinda bummed w/plastic tires. Was trying to avoid buying plastic but the image fooled me. Just lamn, tread is fine but like if you want to really push and pull its rubber not tire. I love this style mower, quiet and a work out. No malfuntions, gas, and I got the catcher so I can feed the cuttings to my horses w/o gas fumes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kary Schlick

customer_reviews.title: Nice Emergency cutter for short grass
customer_reviews.text: This cutter will work as long as your grass is not longer than 3 to 4 inches. Also check the yard for sticks or debris, because this will stop the cutter in its tracks. Good for small yards. Make sure you don't allow the grass to get too long in between cuttings, which means in the summer months, you will be cutting often. Next time, I would purchase the one with the grass cutter. This cutter will do nothing for the edges of the grass, strictly for the yard only.
customer_reviews.author: Meechie Moo

customer_reviews.title: Save the planet vanity machine
customer_reviews.text: This reel mower is awesome! No gas, no emissions, no footprint on the planet and my lawn still gets a nice haircut! I'm able to rip through shin high grass with this thing!! Some spots need to be mowed over a couple times, because the grass flattens or whatever. After a few mows you get the hang of it and how to efficiently mow your lawn with this. Not to mention its kinda fun and you can still hear people talk to you while you mow away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never buying a gas mower again.
customer_reviews.text: We have a smaller grass area in our rear yard, I purchased this in hopes that it would be easy for my 9 year old to push in addition less maintenance than a traditional gas push mower. This has absolutely exceeded my expectations I will never purchase another gas mower. This the such a great quality mower, easy to use, and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh! I had forgotten the magic sound of a reel mower. It won't work for everyone, but this petite one does the trick for me on my small patch of grass. The packaging was easy to deal with and assembly was a snap. 15 minutes, tops. For folks worrying about too-short cuts that damage grass, the 5-blade model allows the max cutting height to be adjusted to 2.25 inches. Amazon shows another 14 inch 5-blade mower that sells for about $99. I chose this $69 model when I read that they are both made by the same company. Don't know what the extra $30 buys, but this one is a solid little machine well worth the modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this push-mower to keep a garden plot tidy. I have only used it once, but it worked really well. As what some other purchasers are stating: assembly is very easy, but you will need a pair of small needle nose pliers to get the little metal locking disks properly placed. I think this lawn mower will serve me well for years to come (with a drop-off now and then to get the blades resharpened), so I do recommend this item for purchase to keep a small lawn tidy.
customer_reviews.author: CPerry

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors probably think I’m crazy using this since they have fancy gas operated machines and such, but this thing has impressed me!! Love that it’s not too loud so I can use earlier/later in the day without the loud ass noise. Plus it’s environmental friendly!!! ...I plug in my headphones and go to work!! ...Just hope it doesn’t rust. Worth the $90
customer_reviews.author: jacmel

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job getting into small places
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Toro Zero Turn tractor which does a great job but it cannot get into narrow places. I use this to trim the areas between and around trees (especially when I do not want a heavy tractor on the roots). I also have an island in a pond that needs to be trimmed. This is light enough for me to carry it over a very unstable temporary bridge. I also use it to trim hard to get to spots on my edging.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cuts the grass
customer_reviews.text: This little lawnmower does the job. Nothing fantastic since it doesn't suck up the grass, but it does cut what's in front of it. One thing about it is if anything gets stuck in the blades you'll need to stop because the blades can't cut it. I guess that's something you should expect.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting the cutting height is tricky.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a little yard like mine even after a week of rain only took a couple extra passes in the thicker areas to get a good even cut across the whole yard. Sure the neighbors looked at me funny but it did the job and it was cheap (and old fashioned) enough I'm not worried about it getting stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Spudzilla

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lawn mower that I could use in between times when my lawn was cut. I have trouble pulling the cord on regular mowers to start them and remembered using this type of lawn mower over 55 years ago and enjoyed using them. I purchased this one and put it together myself and started using it. It works well. The blades are smooth and sharp. I like the way it cuts the grass and how easy it is to push it. Wish I had thought about this before as I would’ve bought years ago. I even showed my 10 year old grand daughter how to use it and she enjoyed it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Short

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to push. Cuts OK. A lot less work than the old electric mower I have been using because I don't have to wrangle a cord all over the yard. My back yard is irregularly shaped and has a slope. Also a lot of things to work around - deck, garden boxes, steps. This mower is great for that situation because it is easy to maneuver and not very heavy. As others have noted, there is about a three inch gap between the wheels and blades, so you can't get real close to a structure. But at this price, it deserves five stars.
customer_reviews.author: ggj

customer_reviews.title: Avoid twigs haha
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It cuts the grass, but a little warning, if you have a tree make sure you get all the twigs and branches out of the yard because even the tiniest twig gets stuck in the blade it stops the mower dead in it's tracks. But that is to be expected, I miss the old style mowers, and this just brings back memories of when I was younger, cept inatead of a cliffside I am mowing my tiny yard now, it's all I need. The blade came pre set, and the handle is a little flimsey , I plan to make a wooden handle or wrap duct tape around it to give it more stability .
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Straight

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for mowing around little kids. It’s quiet and more effective than you would think. The grass looks better than when mowing with a gas powered mower. I wish I had gone with the bigger size. The only downside is that you have to overlap go over some spots repeatedly to get an even cut. Overall, it is great to have around. Ideal for people with small yards, or if you need another option around kids or difficult inclines.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Perfecr for the 30 square feet of lawn I have to mow. Any larger and I would want a wider mower. The cons: really tall grass with the thick stems do not mow so well. You are gonna have to touch up with the weed wacker if you let your lawn go too long. And sticks will jam it up. It doesnt plow through and mulch them like a gas mower.
customer_reviews.author: GrokkoW

customer_reviews.title: Good old style for small areas. But needs to go forth and back to do a decent cut.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit tricky to adjust it, so it cuts the grass. I bought it to " spot cut" areas in a larger lawn. I do need to sort of go forwards and backwards. It does not just cut, like it shows on the video. I fall easily, am a senior, so just wanted for a bit of cutting in between the yard person coming. Price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Dollymop22

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, I've had better in the past.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok mower, have had better. If you hit a small stone it will stop you dead in your tracks. Also if your mowing a certain area or tight area, you might have to go back and forth a few times as it misses blades of grass. If your mowing a straight lines it's probably much better but moving around items it misses blades of grass.
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: Great for small garden area
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. It was easy to put together and easy to use. I got it since I put up some “fencing” to go around. It’s great for the small space. I read all the negative reviews and expected it to have more trouble cutting the grass, but it was perfect. It would be too small to cut my whole lawn, but for a little garden area, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: David Marcovitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower! Light and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself (70 yr old female) so that I could keep up with our very small yard in between the mowers that come every 2 weeks. This was fun to use and does a great job!! The other reviews are right that you have to remove any sticks or anything else in the yard that will stop it flat! A cleared yard though.. works perfectly and is easy to move around and push. It's fun to use for someone that cannot lift a heavy mower!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: works well on really thin grass
customer_reviews.text: This mower works great if you have golf course grass and no twigs. If you live anywhere where the grass is thick, there are weeds in your lawn, or you have trees that drop pinecones/twigs, don't waste your money - it is not worth the insane effort it takes to push this thing through tall grass.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Works well but if you have a big yard not for you
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. We recently moved to a rental property that has a MUCH smaller yard than we used to have. My husband didn't want to use a gas or even electric powered mower to try to conserve energy, be more eco-responsible, etc. He is the only one who uses it but he does say it works well. He generally has to go over an area a couple of times to get a really good cut but he's finished the lawn in 30 minutes which is still very short. We're saving energy and not emitting any greenhouse gases. Cool.
customer_reviews.author: MomofBoys

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small yard and didn't want to fool with a mower that was going to need gasoline, batteries, maintenance, etc. This took 2 minutes to assemble. It seems well made. It's small, easy to move around, but heavy enough to spin and cut. The narrow mower is easier to push than wider ones I have used in the past, but of course it takes more passes. You need to know that a push mower won't work for high grass (it just bends over) but if your grass isn't thick, tall, or wet this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to use and extremely effective
customer_reviews.text: I've always wondered about these 20th century contraptions and based on the reviews I decided to get one. Made me wonder what the point of a gas mower is. This is lighter, quiet, extremely effective and can easily take on hills and more difficult terrain. Unless need a wider mower to do larger areas, then this should be your go-to. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcusio

customer_reviews.title: Good Mower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a backup in case my other lawn mower died. I was a little nervous about purchasing it because I didn't think it would work. It actually works very well. Flat surfaces preferred as it's a spinning blade but it's very light weight and was really easy to put together. I use it about once a week on my yard and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vecker

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I do not like using lawn mowers, thus I’ve never been good at the pull starts so I wanted something easy. I’m 125 lbs with only the muscle I’ve gained lifting a 3 year old, but this mower is SO EASY to push, I can push it using only one arm. It’s actually a lot of fun, I wish I had a bigger lawn now because I can take care of it in about 5 minutes with this thing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good tool
customer_reviews.text: I just scarified and over seeded my lawn so I needed a new mower that isn’t motor powered. This Reel mower is the “REEL DEEL“. Smooth and easy to use. PS.. if you’re mowing over grass that has twigs, or hard objects you will have a hard time. Clean out your section before you continue. Its a chosen to use.
customer_reviews.author: Luis R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how people love this thing. Is it simply for the novelty of having an old school lawn mower? I set this up in about 30min and it was just way too cumbersome and not enjoyable to use. Truth be told I was kind of embarrassed that my neighbor saw me w this thing. Returned the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: DezGlobal

customer_reviews.title: Old School Mower Baby
customer_reviews.text: Works great on grass. I pretend to put gas in it, pretend to start it up, then I make a lawnmower noise as I push it. My neighbors think I'm weird.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gnu

customer_reviews.title: Efficient little mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my yard is mostly wooded so there isn’t too much grass. I assembled this just now and it wasn’t too hard! Except the e-rings were a complete pain. They do not simply “snap on” and I was afraid I’d whack my hand against the blades fighting it. After about twenty minutes I used my smallest pair of needle noise pliers to finally push into place. That aside, it’s pretty efficient!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelszer

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back to gas.
customer_reviews.text: It's true. I'm done fighting a small engine for an hour before mowing each week, only to have it do a sub-par job of actually cutting the lawn for my troubles. This 5 blade reel mower from American Lawn Mower is exactly what I needed. It's light, easy to push, and sharp from the box. It took 10 minutes to assemble and I was done mowing our front yard shortly after. I won't go back to a gas mower. I'd rather spend a little extra time and effort mowing, than a lot of extra time battling a small engine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight mower.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little mower. I have sciatica which sets off my back and every push mower I've ever used has set it off except for this one. I expect this is from it being so lightweight but even though it is lightweight it still mows like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mow a small area of grass, about 10' x 15'. Blades were sharp but didn't cut the grass which was approximately 3" high. I had to mow the same spot over and over again, at least 6 times and even then the grass didn't look like it had been cut at all.
customer_reviews.author: MaryW

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to traditional mowers
customer_reviews.text: I got this reel mower to replace a broken electric mower. I enjoy not having to uncoil and maneuver a long cord around every time I mow. The reel mower is quiet, so I can mow any time without disturbing the neighbors. Reel mowers have a simple design, so they require far less maintenance and have fewer chances for mechanical failure than gas or electric mowers. Note that this reel mower can mow considerably lower than most electric or gas mowers, but not as high.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Good mower, flimsy handle
customer_reviews.text: The bottom assembly looks pretty durable, but the handle is flimsy. Mine came out of the box bent so the handles are off center (as though you’re turning a bike handle but the wheel is still straight). After initially disassembling it to send back I decided to keep it because it’s pretty cheap and I suppose I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Beth T.

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for any type of lawn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for maintaining my new lawn. It completely killed the lawn. Instead of cutting the gross it made the gross to bend. The gross never came back straight and it slowly destroyed. Now the lawn looks horrible. I should have paid few bucks more to get professional lawn mover. Now the return period is over and I can't return it. It's such a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Ramakant

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This mower is horrible, it catches on everything. Do not waste your money. It takes me 40 min to mow a 20x20. If you have ANY weeds in your yard or have the time to mow more than once a week, avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, does a pretty good job. It is not as precise as a gas powered mower, but it does the job. It is not meant for tough weeds my front yard has much different grass then the back and it did not perform as well. I am still getting used to it I have only ever used a gas powered mower but, it is broken n this is a great thing to have on Hand for just that reason.its also great exercise I do recommend getting the collection bag I didn't but i will in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Cut your grass any time!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this product! Now I can exercise and cut the grass at the same time. It was easy to assemble with great instructions on how to use it and it's quiet so I don't disturb the neighbors at 7am. I don'i have to mess with gasoline either, I think my grass appreciates that!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Going back in time and remembering when, this how I use to cut grass!!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for my purpose I bought it for, I have a riding lawn mowing and their area that i can't get to with the riding mower, by getting the walk from behind serve my purpose very well for that hard to get area of my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin McMichael Jr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Trying to figure out how to return this. Not made for dense or living grass. Blades are not sharp. Feel like I’m cutting grass with plastic play scissors. It gets caught up in grass easily and you come to a hard halt.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my wife (by request) could maintain the small courtyard around the hot tub outside our masterbed room while I'm deployed. The yard is to small to get the riding lawn mower through the gate. It takes about 10 min to mow. Leaves a clean even shave promoting growth and encouraging the lawn to fill in the thin spots left by the weed eater we used previously. She says its easy and extremly sharp. She rakes before mowing to remove the small twigs that drop from the Sugar Willows surrounding the yard to ensure smooth operation as they can hang up the blades a little. Not an issue she considers this normal pre-caution .
customer_reviews.author: Parabike

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality but Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This item gets the job done but arrived and had bends and breaks which did not inhibit function. I am satisfied with finding a push mower for under $100 but I would strongly encourage spending more for a higher quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Townill

customer_reviews.title: perfect for some light exercise
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just screw the handles together and attach to the mower. BUT, be careful because the bolts tend to loosen when using the mower. I've had to tighten the bolts several times now.
customer_reviews.author: christina turbitt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Instructions said not recommended for Bermuda grass but it did just find for us. Had some trouble with some of our taller weeds but hopefully they won’t get to that height again.
customer_reviews.author: Jara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful job
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred to give this 4.5 stars, because I was unable to put the little clip in to keep the wheels from falling off. But they didn’t fall off. Works awesome. My landlord doesn’t mow as often or as close to borders as I prefer, so this satisfies my need. Yes you have to avoid sticks or back up a couple times per job. Best for small lawns and gardens.
customer_reviews.author: Seasmoke

customer_reviews.title: This works but it doesn't do a very good job. I typically have to roll over grass ...
customer_reviews.text: This works but it doesn't do a very good job. I typically have to roll over grass multiple times. However, it does cut the grass. Even though it is uneven, I don't really care about the lawn in the backyard. I've already removed half of the lawn to expand my garden. And this lawn mower keeps the grass manageable. I'm happy with this product though because I have absolutely no interest in a gas mower and the price on this was way cheaper than I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: The Lawn Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: This little lawnmower is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cuts the grass almost as well as a gas-powered lawnmower. Even an 80-year-old could push this lightweight contraption.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Push Mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in small areas and in the event my gas powered mower did not start. Took me a while to get the handles onto the actual mower base. Works well and cuts well too. I also bought the sharpening kit for the future. Good exercise too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Herring

customer_reviews.title: Arrives Sharp and Ready to Go!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just the other day - we've begun mowing our lawn every couple of days. The first cut was difficult because the grass was so tall, but we went over it a few times and it was fine. Our yard is small enough that this is perfect and a HUGE money/time/labor saver as compared to the gas mowers. It doesn't require any gas, minimal maintenance (keep it greased!), and it's so lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, powerful
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I love this mower! Soo easy to use, powerful (I have the 5blade), does the job on garden paths where my big mower doesn’t fit. Love that the reel came assembled, needed help to attach poles but I’m a mechanical klutz. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and easy to use. Perfect for areas too small to get a riding or regular push mower through. I bought it for my husband, but I used it and it was easy. I have a bad back and it didn’t strain it at all, even pushing it over an overgrown area.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaknows

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I don't have the upper body strength it takes to start a lawn mower. This one I just push! I get the exercise and my lawn done. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The mower squeaked even from the first time I used it.  It gets louder with each pass.
customer_reviews.text: I was so proud to use a lawn mower that didn't require gasoline. It's so embarrassing and loud, I used it only 2 times and feel I wasted my money. The previous reviews were good, so not sure why mine is so much less. It's truly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I mixed clover with St. Augustine grass in my backyard. I was told a reel mower won't be able to cut clovers because it is too fine. I don't believe it so I tried and proved them wrong. It cut great, easy to maneuver and it is perfect for my small backyard. Thank you, American Lawn Mower. Now I just need to add a grass catcher to it.
customer_reviews.author: Howard!

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for our home use considering we only have a small lawn and a limited backyard space. Most of all, it is environmentally friendly since gas, oil, and motor are not used. The minimal sound it creates when being used still makes our neighbor's dogs bark, but at least they no longer scream and the cats no longer fall from the trees.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Villaritz

customer_reviews.title: Works great and gives you a little work out too.
customer_reviews.text: My grass grows crazy fast so I have already used it several times without issues. Had to make a minor adjustment to the height when I first put it together as by default it cuts super low which is not my preference.The only very minor complaint that I would have is that the handle covers seem to slip and I feel like given a years time they won't want to stay at all but given everything else about this product with the given price I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but did not cut all pieces of grass left multiple strays, even after going over it more then once. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Haliegh Devine

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Chinese junk. Cuts poorly. For my intended use, to trim around a few places it’s OK.
customer_reviews.author: Darren MacAlester

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid that I'd get this home and find that it was a joke. But it cuts grass like a knife through herbs. It's actually fun. You don't get into tight corners because the wheels get in the way. But if your lawn isn't bordered by a building or a brick border, you won't have that issue. Even with that drawback, I love this gadget. I don't have to buy gas for a motored lawn mower, which I always hated, and I don't have to haul a 100 ft extension cord through a window in order to operate my stupid weed wacker.
customer_reviews.author: NYCSHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Buy something better
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was dangerous, the blades are facing you while your placing an e-ring near the sharp blades. The "handlebars"are fake and pointless. It does an okay job at cutting the grass, but nothing to rave about. I will be buying another manual lawn mower in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little mower!!
customer_reviews.text: I have cut my lawn 4 times now and I am impressed at how sturdy this little mower is. I have a small "L" shaped backyard and it takes me 15 min max to cut the lawn the way I like ( I am a bit picky,prob. would take 10 min for anyone else). This mower cuts through the thick Bermuda grass like tissue paper. I had a little trouble pushing with the first cut since the grass had grown about 6 inches high. But I cut every 6-7 days now and it chops right through with little effort. Very happy with this product and how very sturdy it is, and assembley was a snap. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ridergirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble & push. Light weight. Great for little trim jobs around the house.
customer_reviews.author: David Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Generally works
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. You need to make sure the grass is cleaned from pieces of mulch or sticks since it gets stuck and you need to constantly get them out the mower. Overall works as expected,
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product considering it to be manual and a little bit more difficult to use uphill as my yard but still it is very light and is easy to use. I recommend it for a small area like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Fulvia Mancini-Elza

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is made very good quality easy to assemble and it works great in the yard getting around areas that my riding lawn mower can't get around I would recommend it and I would buy it again I love it
customer_reviews.author: maryam

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job and it's easy to use and maneuver
customer_reviews.text: My gas mower blew sand all over me and so I ordered this one. It does a great job and it's easy to use and maneuver. I live on FL and there are some very tough grasses here. This mower cuts 99% of them. There is a viney grass that just bends over when the mower hits it. I don't mind. I knew this mower would not be perfect. I do love the look of the lawn when it's finished. This mower is quiet, lightweight, and easy to maneuver. It turned a dreaded chore in to a pleasant experience. No noise, no dust. Very glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gasLESS,eletricLESS and WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done! My yard had some tall grass areas of 12-15inces and it was down after a few times of going over that area. I can't stop looking at my lawn!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jean-baptiste

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good to have. It does the job however, it will not cut tall weeds. Also, you cannot adjust the height it cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Mow while your neighbors sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this lawn mower for over a year now. Use it as a backup to a 1.8 amp grass trimmer. It is lightweight and easy to use (no gas or oil or plugs). Was easy to assemble. Like that it gives me a choice and that it is quiet and can be used early in the AM when the weather is cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye gas its 2020: get with the program
customer_reviews.text: Eco-friendly, reliable, and it was easy to assemble. No gas, oil, filter, etc. All American Lawn Mower Company makes sense. Its 2020. Get with the program people.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Marcus Duran

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best push mower. Very light but does the job perfectly. And good exercise and no noisy
customer_reviews.author: Karin Covely

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and adjust and not to heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to put together and adjust and not to heavy (I think it's about 15 lbs) Typical push mower, the first few times you cut your lawn of the season, you will probably need to mow it twice but after that, no problems. I love not having to worry about fuel or listening to the loud roar of a gas powered mower. Easy to store, also.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one, finally got this little guy. Wow love it, makes mowing fun, even my step daughters will mow from time to time just to use it. Great product, well made all around 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jjo

customer_reviews.title: 5-Blade Push Reel Lawn Mower
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's ok. The blades could be sharper. But works as described.
customer_reviews.author: EDeyette

customer_reviews.title: Horrible profuct
customer_reviews.text: It does not mow evenly. You have to go through the same spot several times. Horrible don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Maricela

customer_reviews.title: Use on Zoysia
customer_reviews.text: Great lawn mower. I use it on my Zoysia lawn. The lawn has never looked better. We used to use a weed eater with lawn mower attachment which ripped the blades of grass instead of cutting. This is so easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Super little mower for small job and price!
customer_reviews.text: I am OLD and I was able to put this mower together. AND carry it out to my tiny yard. It did a super job mower. It might be more manouverable than I gave it credit for but one of my hands is missing a bone due to arthritis so I struggle with many things. It’s done a very good job cutting too so I’m glad I bought it!!! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Clark

customer_reviews.title: Grass loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. Grass seems to grow back fuller and greener. Feel good about using it as it's good for the grass and environment. Neighbors get a kick out of it I'm sure. Does make some noise and I do wish I got the wider one but overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great city mower
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - very well-made. I got this mower to cut the grass next to the street in front of my house (the strip between the sidewalk and the street). I turned my lawn into flower beds, so this the only area with grass. The blades are super-sharp, and they actually do mow down fairly long grass.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Mows well, though I usually have to do multiple passes. Can be loud, so I wear earplugs. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Time to buy a real mower!!
customer_reviews.text: The height of the mower is not as simple as advertised. Of course you can raise or lower part of smaller wheels - but once you try to take it apart at the wheel / axel to move from A-B-C it is impossible as shown in the manual - our grass needs a shorter cut (inch or less), I hope this saves some time and money and a lot of effort for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Have to redo, redo, even though it wasn’t Even though not very high.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Yardwork Simple!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy does an amazing job! I live in a townhouse & just couldn't justify buying a full size mower for my little yard - not only the expense but also storage! This mower is perfect! It gives my grass a clean cut, is lightweight and easy to maneuver. Best of all, it is small & easy to store when I'm finished! Just maintain it with some WD40 & enjoy hassle free mowing - human powered!
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Looks Better with Reel Type Mower
customer_reviews.text: We have small zoysia lawns in our neighborhood. POA has crew that cuts the lawns with riding mowers with rotary blades. My lawn looks ever so much better when it is cut with this reel type mower. It takes only 20 minutes to mow my lawn, and the most arduous part is emptying the grass catcher. Great for our size lawn.
customer_reviews.author: W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the job I have
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought (as I had to sell my old one when I moved) then found I needed a new one at my new home. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to put together and use. I have a small yard and it did exactly as it should. Very happy about how my yard looked afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well on medium height grass. My yard has lots of rocks, so this works well when the grass isn’t overgrown.
customer_reviews.author: exhale

customer_reviews.title: Great value and price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great value. Light, easy to use, and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: If you have a smaller lawn to tend to, this will get the job done. I have approx 450 sf of lawn to tend to and mow it in 15 minutes with this push mower. Cuts at a good length also; grass is not too short or too tall - just right.
customer_reviews.author: J-Pow

product_meta.title: American Lawn Mower Company 1304-14 14-Inch 5-Blade Push Reel Lawn Mower, Red
product_meta.description:
American Lawn Mower Company 14-Inch 5-Blade Push Reel Lawn Mower is a green alternative to gas-powered lawnmowers. Moreover, this lawn mower is easy to use and does not emit fumes. It can cut your lawn in a precise scissor-like motion that will not shred your grass to make your lawn appear better. This reel lawn mower has a low maintenance hassle-free design that only requires to be sharpened at least once every 3-5 years. Perfect for youths over the age of 13 and compact yards. When you buy it, you won’t have to worry about fuel, maintenance, and repairs that make this push blade mower a smart choice.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The power source behind our mowers hasn't changed much in 100 years. It's still readily available on demand. You can still fuel it for the price of a banana and a glass of milk. It always works when you want it to, and it doesn't leave any residue for the environment to absorb other than a couple of foot prints in a perfectly cut lawn. People- the power behind our mowers in 1895, and the power behind them today. What has changed is the product available to the people. At American Lawn Mower, we've applied a century of technology to a good old fashioned idea: the reel lawn mower. Today's reel mowers are lightweight and easy to maneuver. They're ideal for today's smaller lawns, and today's hectic lifestyles. They're always ready when you're ready, and they're almost maintenance free with no spark plugs to foul or engines to clog up. They're good to the environment and they're good to the lawn, snipping the grass for a clean, precise cut. A cut that's helped us carve our niche as the nation's largest manufacturer of in-demand, on-demand reel mowers. We've spent 100 years of perfecting our reel mower designs, streamlining our production processes and searching for the best possible materials to build the best reel mowers possible. And we're proud of all that. But more important still, we've spent the last 100 years, and we'll spend the next 100 more, keeping America Green. American Lawn Mower 14-inch cutting width Reel Lawn Mower. 3 spider 5 blade ball bearing reel. Heat treated alloy steel reel and bed knife blade. 10-inch composite wheels with radial rubber tires. Cutting height adjustment of 1-inch to 1-3/4-inch. T style handle.
feature_bullets: 5-blade reel with a cutting width of 14” and durable 8.5” polymer wheels for maximum maneuverability
Mechanical lawn mower with an adjustable blade height of 1”-1.75” with scissor action cut
Manual grass cutter blades made of heat-treated alloy steel that stays sharp for years
Planet-friendly alternative to gas-powered lawn mowers which is pollution-free and noise-free; Low maintenance, lightweight and easy to use
Capable of cutting grass up to 4 inches tall

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars915 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
